targets.query: from(bucket:"telemetry" |> range(start: -24h) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement=="hive_telemetry" and r._field=="weight_kg" and (v: r.hive_id == v.hive))
from(bucket:"telemetry" |> range(start: -30d) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement=="hive_telemetry" and r._field=="d24h_g" and (v: r.hive_id == v.hive)) |> last()
